channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Business Process Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Business Process Manager

item.title: CVE-2021-38883|2024-08-04T01:51:20.883Z -- ibm -- business%20process%20manager
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0, 19.0, 20,0 and 21.0 and IBM Business Process Manager 8.5 and 8.6 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 209165.
